page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Many are involved in clubs or societies such as tennis,ladies circle,wives fellowship and wine making. In Cawston and Toft nearly 60% of people interviewed are involved in charity work which they all enjoy.Just over 50% of the people interviewed around Thurlaston took part in a range of deeds from "Meals on Wheels" to collecting for Ethiopia. The cinema seems popular as a means of entertainment in Thurlaston.60% of the people interviewed went to the cinema to watch comical films or films of suspense. Musical interests vary.Folk and classical are prefered by older people.Pop music such as Duran Duran,Paul Young and Simple Minds are the young peoles choice.Most people travel to Rugby or Coventry for concerts.
